name: Ahmed Ali
text: NEAR HAS COME the reckoning for men, but they turn away in remissness.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Never does a new reminder come to them from their Lord but they listen to it with dalliance.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Their minds are lost in frivolous pastimes; and the evil-doers discuss secretly: "Is he not but only a man like you? Then why are you taken in by magic seeingly?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: He said: "My Lord knows whatever is spoken in the heavens and the earth. He hears all and knows everything."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Yet they say: "These are only confused dreams," or rather: "He has invented them;" or: "He is only a poet. Let him therefore bring a miracle to us as the earlier (apostles) were sent with."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Not one habitation that We destroyed before them had believed. So how can they believe?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Never did We send a message before you but through a man, whom We inspired. If you do not know, then ask the keepers of the oracles of God.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We did not make their bodies immune to hunger, nor were they immortal.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Then We made Our promise good to them and delivered whomsoever We pleased, and destroyed the transgressors.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We have sent down to you a Book which has a reminder for you. Do you not understand?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: How many habitations that were sinful have We demolished utterly, and raised other people after them.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Whensoever they sensed Our punishment they fled from them.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "Do not flee; go back to your halls of pleasure and your habitations, so that you may be interrogated."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "Woe, alas," they said, "we were really sinful."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And this remained their lament till We mowed them down and made them extinct.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We have not created the heavens and the earth, and all that lies between them, out of fun.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: If We had pleased to make a plaything We could have made it Ourself, if We had cared to do so.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: In fact We strike the truth against the false, which shatters it, and it disappears. Woe to you for what you attribute (to Him)!

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Whosoever is in the heavens and the earth belongs to Him; and those who are near Him do not disdain to worship Him or weary (of His service),

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Nor cease to endeavour praising Him night and day.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Or have they taken gods from the earth who can raise the dead?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Had there been gods apart from God, both (the heavens and the earth) would have been despoiled. Much too glorious is God, the Lord of the mighty throne, for things they assert!

name: Ahmed Ali
text: He cannot be questioned about what He does, but they will be questioned.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Have they taken gods besides God? Say: "Then bring your proof. Here is the Book of those who are with me, and the Book of those who have gone before me." But most men do not know the truth and turn away.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We have not sent an apostle before you without instructing him that there is no god but I, so worship Me.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And yet they say: "Ar-Rahman has begotten a son." Too exalted is He! In fact, those (they call His sons) were His honoured votaries.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They did not precede Him in their speech, and acted on His command.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: He knows what was there before them and what came after them; and they did not intercede for any one but whom He willed, and they were filled with awe of Him.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: If any one of them said: "I am God besides Him," We should award him Hell; for this is how We requite the evil-doers.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Do not these unbelievers see that the heavens and the earth were an integrated mass, then We split them and made every living thing from water? Will they not believe even then?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We placed stabilisers in the earth so that as it revolved with them you lived undisturbed; and We provided passageways between them so that men may find their way;

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And We made the sky a well-protected roof. Still they turn away from His signs!

name: Ahmed Ali
text: It is He who created night and day, the sun and the moon, revolving on its orbit.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We have given no man everlastingness before you. So then if you die, will they live ever after?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Every soul will know the taste of death. We tempt you with evil and with good as a trial; and to Us you will return.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: But when the unbelievers see you they make fun of you (and say): "Is this the one who mentions your gods (deridingly)?" Yet in Ar-Rahman they disbelieve!

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Man is made of inordinate haste. We will show you Our signs, then you will not desire to hasten (the punishment).

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Yet they say: "When will the promised threat come to pass, if you speak the truth?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: If only the unbelievers could apprehend the moment when they would neither be able to ward off the fire from their faces and their backs, nor help reach them!

name: Ahmed Ali
text: It will come upon them unawares confounding them, and they will not be able to keep it back, nor will they be given respite.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Many apostles have been scoffed before you; but they who scoffed were themselves caught by what they had ridiculed.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Say: "Who guards you from Ar-Rahman by night and by day?" Yet from a mention of their Lord they turn away.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Or do they have lords of their own besides Us who can defend them? But they are not able to help themselves, nor can they find protection against Us.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We allowed them and their fathers time to enjoy till the very end of their lives. Do they not see Us advancing into the land, reducing its frontiers? Would they still prevail?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Say: "I am warning you by God's command." But the deaf do not hear the call when they are warned.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Even if a whiff of the Lord's chastisement were to touch them they would surely say: "Ah woe, alas, we were surely sinful."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We shall fix the scales of justice on the Day of Resurrection, so that none will be wronged in the least; and even if it were equal to a mustard seed in weight We shall take it (into account). We are sufficient for computation.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We gave Moses and Aaron the Criterion, and a light and reminder for those who take heed for themselves,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Who are fearful of their Lord inwardly and dread the Hour.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And this is a blessed reminder that We have sent down. Will you then deny it?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We had earlier given Abraham true direction, for We knew him well.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: When he said to his father and his people: "What are these idols to which you cling so passionately?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They replied: "We found our fathers worshipping them."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: He said: "You and your fathers were in clear error."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They said: "Are you speaking in earnest, or only jesting?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: He said: "In fact it was your Lord, the Lord of the heavens and the earth, who created them; and I bear witness to this.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: I swear by God I will do something to your idols when you have turned your backs and gone."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So he smashed them up to pieces with the exception of the biggest, so that they may turn to it.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They asked (on return): "Who has done this to our gods? He is surely a mischief-monger."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They said: "We heard a youth talk about them. He is called Abraham."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "Bring him before the people," they said, "that they may bear witness."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "Did you do this to our gods, O Abraham?" they enquired.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "No," he said. "It was done by that chief of theirs. Ask him in case they can speak."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Then they thought and observed: "Surely you are yourselves unjust."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Then crestfallen (they confessed): "Truly, as you know, they cannot speak."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (So Abraham) said: "Then why do you worship something apart from God that cannot profit you or do you harm?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Fie on you and those you worship besides God! Will you not understand?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They said: "Burn him, and save your gods, if you are men of action."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "Turn cold, O fire," We said, "and give safety to Abraham."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They wished to entrap him, but We made them greater losers.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So We delivered him and Lot, and brought them to the land We had blessed for all the people.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And We bestowed on him Isaac, and Jacob as an additional gift, and made them righteous.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And We made them leaders to guide (the people) by Our command; and We inspired them to perform good deeds and observe their moral obligations and pay the zakat; and they obeyed Us.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: To Lot We gave wisdom and knowledge, and saved him from a people who acted villainously and were certainly wicked and disobedient.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Thus We admitted him to Our grace. He is surely one of the righteous.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Remember Noah when he called to Us before this. We heard him and saved him and those with him from great distress;

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And We helped him against the people who rejected Our signs as lies. They were a wicked people indeed, so We drowned them one and all.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (Remember) David and Solomon, when they pronounced judgement about the field which was eaten up at night by sheep belonging to certain people. We were witness to their judgement.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We made Solomon understand the case, and bestowed on each wisdom and knowledge, We subdued the al-jibal (mountains) with David to sing Our praises, and at-tair (birds). It is We who did it.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And We taught him the art of making coats of mail to shield you from each other's violence. Will you not be grateful even then?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We made tempestuous winds obedient to Solomon which blew swiftly to sail at his bidding (with his ships) to the land We had blessed. We are cognisant of everything.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And many of the devils (We also made obedient to him) who dived for him, and did many other things; and We kept watch over them.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (Remember) Job when he called to his Lord: "I am afflicted with distress, and You are the most compassionate of all."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So We heard his cry and relieved him of the misery he was in. We restored his family to him, and along with them gave him others similar to them as a grace from Us and reminder for those who are obedient.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (Remember) Ishmael, Edris and Dhu'l-Kifl. They were men of fortitude,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And they were admitted to Our grace. Verily they were among the doers of good.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And (remember) Dhu'n-Noon (Jonah of the fish), when he went away in anger and imagined We will not test him (with distress). Then he called out from the darkness: "There is no god other than You. All glory to You; surely I was a sinner.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We heard his cry, and saved him from the anguish. That is how We deliver those who believe.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (Remember) Zachariah when he called to his Lord: "Do not leave me alone (and childless), for you are the best of givers."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So We heard him and gave him John, and cured his wife (of barrenness). These were men who vied in good deeds with one another, and prayed to Us with love and awe, and were meek before Us.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (Remember) her who preserved her chastity, into whom We breathed a new life from Us, and made her and her son a token for mankind.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Verily this your order is one order, and I am your Lord; so worship Me.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: But they split up the order among themselves; (yet) all of them have to come back to Me.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So he who does the right and is a believer, will not have his labour denied, for We are congnisant of it.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: It is imperative that a habitation We have destroyed will not desist (from unbelief)

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Until when the way is opened up for Gog and Magog and they press from every elevated place,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And the certain promise (of Doom) comes near. Then the eyes of unbelievers will be fixed in horror, (and they will cry:) "Ah, woe betide, we were indeed heedless of this, and were oppressors and unjust."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Verily you and those you worship other than God will be faggots for Hell; and come to it you will.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Had they really been gods they would not have entered it: They will all abide in it for ever.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: There will only be groaning for them, and they will not hear any thing.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: But those for whom a good reward had been fore-ordained by Us, will be far removed from it,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And will not hear its hissing, and will live for ever in the midst of what their hearts desire.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They will have safety from the mighty terror, and angels will receive them, (saying:) "This is your day which had been promised you."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: The day We shall roll up the heavens like a written scroll, We shall revert it (to nothing) as it was before We first created it. This is a promise incumbent on Us; We will certainly fulfil it.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We had prescribed in the Book of Psalms after the reminder and admonition, that those of Our creatures who are good will in the end rule the earth.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Verily there is a message in this for people who are devout.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We have sent you as a benevolence to the creatures of the world.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Say: "This is what has been revealed to me: 'Your God is one and only God.' So will you bow in homage to Him?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: If they turn away, tell them: "I have warned you all alike. I do not know if what has been promised you is near or far away.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: He knows surely what you say aloud, and what you hide within your breasts.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: I do not know if this be a trial for you, or a little advantage for a while."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "Judge in truth (between us), O Lord," he said. "Our Lord is merciful, whose help we seek against what you attribute."
